Livewire Component Folder

Enhanced project tree view for Laravel Livewire components.

Features

  • Displays component name instead of folder name with lightning bolt icon (⚡)
  • Shows child files as extensions (.blade.php, .php, .css, .js)
  • Supports CSS and JavaScript files alongside PHP and Blade templates
  • Customizable double-click actions: expand/collapse, open files, or open selected files
  • Multiple split layouts: tabs, side-by-side, or stacked
  • Configurable file selection for opening specific file types
  • Auto-detection from config/livewire.php

Configuration

Settings → Tools → Livewire Component Folder
